active_skill.en_text: Activate a random skill from the list: 1) Deal 300000 fixed damage to all enemies; Change all orbs to Fire and Light orbs, 2) Change Wood, Heal, Jammer, Poison, and Mortal Poison orbs to Fire orbs; For 4 turns, Fire orbs are more likely to appear by 15%, 3) Change Dark and Heal orbs to Water orbs; For 1 turn, increase combo count by 2, 4) Change all orbs to Fire and Dark orbs; For 1 turn, 2.5x ATK for Dragon and Machine types, 5) Change Wood and Light orbs to Fire orbs; For 2 turns, Heal orbs are more likely to appear by 15%, 6) Change the 2nd column from the right to Heal orbs, 7) Change all orbs to Wood, Light, and Heal orbs, 8) Change all orbs to Light and Dark orbs

jp_skill.name: ヒロインガチャパワー

random_skills.name: グリモワールシェイド
random_skills.raw_description: 敵全体に30万の固定ダメージ。 全ドロップを火と光ドロップに変化。

random_skills.name: エアロウェイク・フレア
random_skills.raw_description: 木、回復、お邪魔、毒ドロップを火ドロップに変化。 4ターンの間、火ドロップが少し落ちやすくなる。

random_skills.name: メテオシュート・アクア
random_skills.raw_description: 闇と回復ドロップを水ドロップに変化。 1ターンの間、2コンボ加算される。

random_skills.name: バルディンアイズ
random_skills.raw_description: 全ドロップを火と闇ドロップに変化。 1ターンの間、ドラゴンとマシンタイプの攻撃力が2.5倍。

random_skills.name: スターリロード・フレア
random_skills.raw_description: 木と光ドロップを火ドロップに変化。 2ターンの間、回復ドロップが少し落ちやすくなる。

random_skills.name: ヒーリングカット
random_skills.raw_description: 右から2列目の縦1列を回復ドロップに変化。

random_skills.name: 転界降龍陣・山神
random_skills.raw_description: 全ドロップを木、光、回復ドロップに変化。

random_skills.name: 継界召龍陣・闇光
random_skills.raw_description: 全ドロップを光と闇ドロップに変化。

jp_skill.raw_description: 特定のスキルがランダムで発動。

random_skills.name: 그리모어 쉐이드
random_skills.raw_description: 적 전체에게 30만의 고정 대미지 모든 드롭을 불과 빛드롭으로 변화

random_skills.name: 에어로 웨이크 플레어
random_skills.raw_description: 나무, 회복, 방해, 독드롭을 불드롭으로 변화 4턴 동안 불드롭의 출현 확률이 조금 높아진다

random_skills.name: 메테오 슛 아쿠아
random_skills.raw_description: 어둠과 회복드롭을 물드롭으로 변화 1턴 동안 콤보수가 2 추가된다

random_skills.name: 발딘 아이즈
random_skills.raw_description: 모든 드롭을 불과 어둠드롭으로 변화 1턴 동안 드래곤과 머신타입의 공격력이 2.5배

random_skills.name: 스타 리로드 - 플레어
random_skills.raw_description: 나무와 빛드롭을 불드롭으로 변화 2턴 동안 회복드롭의 출현 확률이 조금 높아진다

random_skills.name: 힐링 컷
random_skills.raw_description: 오른쪽 끝에서 2번째 세로 1렬을 회복드롭으로 변화

random_skills.name: 전계강룡진 산신
random_skills.raw_description: 모든 드롭을 나무, 빛, 회복드롭으로 변화

random_skills.name: 어둠 빛 드래곤 소환진
random_skills.raw_description: 모든 드롭을 빛과 어둠드롭으로 변화

na_skill.name: Heroine Power

random_skills.name: Grimoire Shade
random_skills.raw_description: Inflicts 300,000 damage on all enemies; changes all Orbs to Fire & Light Orbs

random_skills.name: Aero Wake - Flare
random_skills.raw_description: Changes Wood, Heal, Poison & Jammers to Fire;  Fire Orbs slightly more likely to appear for 4 turns

random_skills.name: Meteor Shot - Aqua
random_skills.raw_description: Changes Dark & Heal Orbs to Water Orbs; adds 2 combos for 1 turn

random_skills.name: Baldin's Eyes
random_skills.raw_description: Changes all Orbs to Fire & Dark Orbs; 2.5x ATK for Dragon & Machine Types for 1 turn

random_skills.name: Starry Road - Flare
random_skills.raw_description: Changes Wood & Light Orbs to Fire Orbs; Heal Orbs slightly more likely to appear for 2 turns

random_skills.name: Healing Cut
random_skills.raw_description: Changes the 2nd column from the right to Heal Orbs

random_skills.name: Dimensional Formation - Mountain God
random_skills.raw_description: Changes all Orbs to Wood, Light & Heal Orbs

random_skills.name: Draco Summon - Light & Dark
random_skills.raw_description: Changes all Orbs to Light & Dark Orbs
